node.title: Alex Braes inquest told the teen's ability to cope with pain from infected toenail made it hard to assess him
node.description: The inquest into the death of the Broken Hill teenager Alex Braes, who was turned away from hospital three times before he died, has heard he was conscious and speaking to staff and was "compensating for the sepsis until he couldn't".
node.content:
["An inquest into how a Broken Hill teenager died\u00a0from an infected toenail\u00a0has heard his condition deteriorated rapidly in his final hours.", "Alex Braes died on September 22, 2017 with a suspected flesh eating bacteria known as necrotising fasciitis, after he was turned away three times from Broken Hill Hospital\u2019s emergency department.", "About 21 hours after he first presented to the Broken Hill Hospital emergency department, and with 12 hours left to live, the treatment of teenager Alex Braes was handed over to the chief medical officer of the Royal Flying Doctors Service (RFDS).", "Randall Greenberg today spoke\u00a0at length in the New South Wales Coroners Court about Mr Braes' condition, and issues which prevented the RFDS from transferring him to Sydney or Adelaide sooner.", "Dr Greenberg said when he first saw Alex around 2:00pm on September 21, 2017: \"I was the team leader the moment I arrived.\"", "", "
Dr Randall Greenberg also works at Dubbo Base Hospital as the Director of Critical Care, an intensivist and an Emergency Physician.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "The veteran clinician with 36 years experience, believes in hindsight there are a number of \"ifs\" now that he was \"aware of the outcome\",\u00a0including not taking Alex to Adelaide instead of Sydney.", "
'He fell off the cliff'\u00a0
", "Tragically, what worked against Alex was his overall health and age.", "Dr Greenberg told the inquest\u00a0he was in a \"relatively good\" condition, for someone who was critically ill.", "He revealed all the medical staff \"misjudged\" the 18-year who was \"compensating very well\" because he was \"a young fit fellow\".", "\"An older person would've been much more unwell, prior to me arriving,\" according to Greenberg.", "Mr Braes was conscious and speaking to staff and was \"compensating for the sepsis until he couldn't\".", "
Pilot supply issues\u00a0
", "The decision not to transfer the teenager sooner was also under the microscope.", "It was a call made far more difficult due to a lack of available pilots at the RFDS base in Broken Hill that day.", "Due to restrictions imposed by Civil Aviation Safety Authority, pilots can only fly 11 hours a day, with a possible extension of one hour.", "With the clock starting \"as soon as they get the first phone call\", according to Dr Greenberg.", "Unfortunately, the night pilot had called in sick.", "", "
The Royal Flying Doctors Service currently has one plane permanently based in Broken Hill.\u00a0(Supplied)
", "If they had flown down to Adelaide the only available pilot wouldn't have been able to return, as their allowed time would've expired.", "This would've left the state's\u00a0far west without a pilot or plane, according to the retrieval specialist.", "Dr Greenberg recounted the situation was the same in Dubbo, where the pilot's hours had also expired.", "From February 2022, the Broken Hill RFDS base has funding available for a second plane, along with another locally based pilot and nurse.", "\"We're in process of recruiting for that [those]\u00a0position(s),\" he said.", "The highly experienced clinician also took time at the end of his testimony to address the Braes family directly.", "The inquest continues."]
